title: The Other Side of Dead
description: Contained within this collection are seven stories, each story dealing with the mystery of death and what may lie beyond. Contents:Rotating FleshVery Dead DollsTwo SkinsCrimson DreamsBeg the other ManLumpsBlood CurseReading with the light on, preferably whilst holding a teddy bear is advised.Pleased be warned that some of the stories do contain violent imagary usually associated with a horror anthology.
author: Ian Woodhead
